Object Parameters: Time until it switches to Speed 2
(Total) time until it switches to Speed 3
Description:
2 Time Escalators from Coconut Mall. One of the two escalators uses the given speed, the other uses a multiplied speed of -1 (negative speed), so they always run in opposite directions.
For more information, see the [[Moving Terrain#Usage in Coconut Mall|Moving Terrain]] page.
